Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 18 Nov 2018Rising interest rates affect loans. Finance(banks, mortgage companies) will do better + possibility loan rate increases. Investors will move their money away from stocks and bond since interest rates are higher (Bond yield have inverse relationship with i/r). REITs will do better since increase in i/r suggests better economic performance. Since you are doing ETF, there is already diversification of cyclical and non-cyclical stocks.0 comments0
